[File: aptos-core/tools/compute-module-expansion-size/src/main.rs] [Function: extract_module_info()] [Deadlock Risk] Does rayon::scope() properly handle panics in worker threads, or could a panic in extract_module_info_single() cause the scope to hang indefinitely waiting for results? (Medium)
